content.speaker: Interviewer
content.text: Welcome and thank you for joining today.

content.speaker: Interviewer
content.text: Can you describe a challenging project you worked on?

content.speaker: Candidate
content.text: I led the development of a high-traffic microservices system.

content.speaker: Candidate
content.text: Primarily Docker, Kubernetes, and AWS Lambda.

content.speaker: Interviewer
content.text: How did you ensure system reliability?

content.speaker: Candidate
content.text: We implemented circuit breakers and extensive monitoring.

content.speaker: Interviewer
content.text: Can you discuss a time you solved a critical bug?

content.speaker: Candidate
content.text: We traced a memory leak to a third-party library and issued a patch.

content.speaker: Candidate
content.text: What does success look like in this role?
